biocontainers.name: blasr
biocontainers.summary: Software for mapping single molecule sequencing (sms) reads that are thousands of bases long, with divergence between the read and genome dominated by insertion and deletion error.

biotools.summary: Software for mapping Single Molecule Sequencing (SMS) reads that are thousands of bases long, with divergence between the read and genome dominated by insertion and deletion error.

bioschemas.summary: Software for mapping Single Molecule Sequencing (SMS) reads that are thousands of bases long, with divergence between the read and genome dominated by insertion and deletion error.
